articles.description: With the award based on performances within a specific time period, Lionel Messi will have an advantage and therefore be the favourite.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi, Robert Lewandowski and Mohamed Salah have all been shortlisted for the star-studded Best FIFA Men's Player of the Year award. 
The trio beat off competition from the likes of Cristiano… [+1744 chars]

articles.author: Chris Wheeler
articles.title: Manchester United: Paul Pogba suffers ANOTHER injury setback and is set be out until late February - Daily Mail
articles.description: Pogba returned to Manchester from a warm-weather rehab in Dubai last month following talks with Rangnick who believes the Frenchman could be ruled out until late February.
articles.content:
Paul Pogba could be out of action until the end of February as his Manchester United career threatens to fizzle out.
Pogba hasn't played since the start of November after damaging a thigh muscle in … [+2690 chars]

articles.author: James Marshment
articles.title: Big blow for Rangers as Blackburn come forward with plan for Leeds star - TEAMtalk
articles.description: Leeds United will consider a second loan approach for Crysencio Summerville after this weekend's FA Cup action, with Blackburn Rovers seemingly favourites for his signature.
articles.content:
